Class PlayingScreenController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.PlayingScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class PlayingScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the playing screen.
